name: SoothingSoundsRelax,StudyorMeditate
0:
”Alexa, open soothing sounds”
”Alexa, ask soothing sounds to play babbling brook”
”Play the audio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soothing sounds
des:
With nearly 1/3rd of the American population suffering from
sleep deprivation, lack of focus and living in a fast and
busy city life has made everything hectic with no time to relax.

This skill will help you gain better concentration, as well as
rejuvenate the soul, mind, and body. These sounds are played in
a way that they will help you lighten your brain and help you 
sleep better or even help you in focusing on more significant 
tasks. Some of the sounds are composed by the sleep therapists
and psychiatrists.

So, just try them out and if you like what you listen, make sure
to leave a review and a rating.

Currently, there are 40 different sounds:
to begin the playlist just say "Alexa, open soothing sounds"
Or to open a particular sound, 
say "Alexa, ask soothing sounds to play (Name of the sound)"

Names of the sounds are:
1. Fire
2. Crystal
(Sound of Chinese Crystal Bowl)
3. Flute
4. Car Journey
5. Underwater
6. Whale
7. Wind
(Windchime sound)
8. Birds
9. Waterfall
10. Rainfall
11. Universe
12. Rain on roof
13. Ocean
14. Meditation
(Om Sound)
15. Airplane
16. Cricket
17. Forest
18. Beach
19. Vacuum
20. Texture
21. Brown
22. Spa
23. Windy Leaves
24. Snow Storm
25. Shower
26. Dishwasher
27. Cave
28. Fountains
29. Washing Machine
30. Babbling Brook
31. Camp Fire
32. Jungle Safari
33. Piano
34. Clock
35. Train
36. Thunderstorm
37. Hypnosis
38. baby
(Mother's womb sound- proven good to relax a weeping baby)
39. fan
40. fan on medium


Try them out!
Make a request for more relaxing sounds at apooos3@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
